select * from company where
id = (#{id}) and
name like #{name} and
description ilike #{description} and
status like #{status} and
categories && (#{categories}) and
(name ilike #{q} or description ilike #{q}) and
1 = 1
order by {sort}

select r.*
, case when rfr.reaction = 1 then true else false end as disable
from companyrate r
left join companyratereaction rfr on rfr.id = r.id and rfr.author = r.author and rfr.userId = #{userId}
where
r.id = #{id} and
r.author = #{author} and
r.rate = #{rate} and
r.time >= #{time} and
r.review like #{review} and
r.usefulCount >= (#{usefulCount}) and
1 = 1
order by {sort}

select * from companyratecomment where
commentId = #{commentId} and
id = #{id} and
author = #{author} and
userId = #{userId} and
comment ilike #{comment} and
time >= #{time} and
updateAt >= #{updateAt} and
histories in #{histories} and
1 = 1
order by {sort}
